mean_cn: n.经历，感受，体验；  vt.体验，感受
mean_en: the knowledge and skill that you have gained through doing something for a period of time; the process of gaining this; the things that have happened to you that influence the way you think and behave; an event or activity that affects you in some way; events or knowledge shared by all the members of a particular group in society, that influences the way they think and behave
sentence: That roller coaster ride was a frightening experience!
sentence_trans: 这趟过山车真是一次可怕的经历！
word_etyma: ex出 + per尝试 + ience名词后缀 → 尝试出来的东西 → experience经验
